name: ClaimResponse
title: ClaimResponse
description: This resource provides the adjudication details from the processing of a Claim resource.

elements.name: ClaimResponse
elements.description: This resource provides the adjudication details from the processing of a Claim resource.

elements.name: identifier
elements.description: A unique identifier assigned to this claim response.

elements.name: status
elements.description: The status of the resource instance.

elements.name: type
elements.description: A finer grained suite of claim type codes which may convey additional information such as Inpatient vs Outpatient and/or a specialty service.

elements.name: subType
elements.description: A finer grained suite of claim type codes which may convey additional information such as Inpatient vs Outpatient and/or a specialty service.

elements.name: use
elements.description: A code to indicate whether the nature of the request is: to request adjudication of products and services previously rendered; or requesting authorization and adjudication for provision in the future; or requesting the non-binding adjudication of the listed products and services which could be provided in the future.

elements.name: patient
elements.description: The party to whom the professional services and/or products have been supplied or are being considered and for whom actual for whom payment is being sought.

elements.name: created
elements.description: The date this resource was created.

elements.name: insurer
elements.description: The party responsible for authorization, adjudication and reimbursement.

elements.name: requestor
elements.description: The provider which is responsible for the claim, predetermination or preauthorization.

elements.name: request
elements.description: Original request resource reference.

elements.name: outcome
elements.description: The outcome of the claim, predetermination, or preauthorization processing.

elements.name: disposition
elements.description: A human readable description of the status of the adjudication.

elements.name: preAuthRef
elements.description: Reference from the Insurer which is used in later communications which refers to this adjudication.

elements.name: preAuthPeriod
elements.description: The time frame during which this authorization is effective.

elements.name: payeeType
elements.description: Type of Party to be reimbursed: Subscriber, provider, other.

elements.name: item
elements.description: A claim line. Either a simple (a product or service) or a 'group' of details which can also be a simple items or groups of sub-details.

elements.name: addItem
elements.description: The first-tier service adjudications for payor added product or service lines.

elements.name: adjudication
elements.description: The adjudication results which are presented at the header level rather than at the line-item or add-item levels.

elements.name: total
elements.description: Categorized monetary totals for the adjudication.

elements.name: payment
elements.description: Payment details for the adjudication of the claim.

elements.name: fundsReserve
elements.description: A code, used only on a response to a preauthorization, to indicate whether the benefits payable have been reserved and for whom.

elements.name: formCode
elements.description: A code for the form to be used for printing the content.

elements.name: form
elements.description: The actual form, by reference or inclusion, for printing the content or an EOB.

elements.name: processNote
elements.description: A note that describes or explains adjudication results in a human readable form.

elements.name: communicationRequest
elements.description: Request for additional information.

elements.name: insurance
elements.description: Financial instruments for reimbursement for the health care products and services specified on the claim.

elements.name: error
elements.description: Errors encountered during the processing of the adjudication.
